__e: These are the voyages of the starship Enterprise. Its five-year mission:
This is the Starship Enterprise. Your message is breaking up.
This is the final cruise of the Starship Enterprise under my command.
What if I told you that Starfleet isn't planning an invasion, that no one on Earth has even heard of you?
Over 400 in the crew of a starship, aren't there, captain?
Starfleet didn't send us this vessel. And you're not here to help.
I think I can guess where the Stardust is being made.
Look, I just want to make sure that Starfire's okay.
Beyond that, the... um... nearest star system would be... at least six months too far.
I wasn't much older than you when I left for San Francisco to go to Starfleet Academy.
He carries starlight in his wake.
There are no star systems within 2,500 light-years.
I've been reviewing your report on the Star-child... and it deals almost entirely with her mother.
And... he was a friend... who... wasn't afraid to let me know when I am wrong.
I didn't want to have anything to do with Starfleet then, and I'm sorry that I have to now.
It may be the case that every starship is equipped with an artificial life form.
You should have thought about that before you attacked a Federation starship.
I will laugh when a Federation starship arrives and puts you back in a cell.
It helps being the only Starfleet ship within 30,000 light-years.
Which, as I was saying, our biggest problem is: : : Keeping the Earth's entire starfleet off our tail: : : While we make our escape after we've destroyed New Chicago:
